attributes.action: stop cadburies being taken over by the usa (Crafts) keep it british
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we are rivited at the take over bid of cadburies by the american crafts company which will not only result in job losses but also in loosing a national institution Rule Britannia long live the British people

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
